title: India vs Sri Lanka: From Suryakumar Yadav to Yuzvendra Chahal, five visiting players who impressed on the tour
snippet: We've got 11 players to choose from and all eleven are playing," said India coach Rahul Dravid on the eve of the second Test against Sri Lanka. As many as four debut caps were handed during the second T20I,

title: Sri Lanka vs India
snippet: Colombo: Rahul Dravid believes that the new crop of Indian batsmen will learn with experience that "not all wickets will be flat" and they need to develop the art of scrapping it out on low-scoring tracks like the ones on offer during the last two T20 Internationals against Sri Lanka.

title: Sri Lanka eye series win after restricting India to 81
snippet: By Rex Clementine Birthday boy Wanindu Hasaranga is emerging to be a top class match winner as he claimed career best figures of four for nine on his 24th birthday to help Sri Lanka reduce India to 81 for eight in the third and final T-20 International at RPS yesterday.

title: Man dies while being treated at spa in Thalawathugoda
snippet: The Thalangama Police launched investigation after a 36-year-old man has died while being treated at a Spa at Thalawathugoda in Thalangama yesterday.

title: 3rd T20I: Sri Lanka beat India by 7 wickets, win series
snippet: Sri Lanka crushed India by seven wickets to win the third and final T20 International and clinch the three-game series 2-1 here at the R Premadasa Stadium on Thursday. Leg-spinner Wanindu Hasaranga took 4/9 in his four overs to help host restrict India to 81/8 in 20 overs.

title: Man nabbed with Rs. 400Mn worth heroin
snippet: A man was arrested with 40 kg of heroin which has a street value of Rs.400 million during a raid at Rerukana in Bandaragama early this morning.

title: India vs Sri Lanka, 3rd T20I: Bowlers clinch T20I series for Sri Lanka
snippet: Celebrating his 24th birthday in style, leg-spinner Wanindu Hasaranga showed exactly why he is ranked as the No. 2 T20I bowler in the world, taking

title: Cricket: Wanindu Hasaranga steers Sri Lanka to T20 series win over India
snippet: Spinner Wanindu Hasaranga celebrated his birthday by taking four wickets as Sri Lanka beat India by seven wickets and took the three-match Twenty20 series 2-1 in Colombo on Thursday, securing their first series win in the format since 2019.

title: Sri Lanka beat India in third T20I, win series
snippet: Sri Lanka beat a depleted Indian cricket team to win the third T20I and seal the three-match series by a 2-1 margin.India, who are without several players after Krunal Pandya tested positive for the coronavirus,

title: India win toss, elect to bat first against Sri Lanka in series-decider third T20I
snippet: Colombo/IBNS: Indian captain Shikhar Dhawan won the toss and elected to bat first against Sri Lanka in the series-deciding third T20I here Thursday.

title: Man nabbed with Rs. 400Mn worth heroin
snippet: A man was arrested with 40 kg of heroin which has a street value of Rs.400 million during a raid at Rerukana in Bandaragama early this morning.

title: I may even cross over to another party if necessary: Rajitha
snippet: SJB MP- Rajitha Senaratne said he will cross over to another party if he feels necessary.

title: Series' chumminess quotient high as young Sri Lanka take advice from Dhawan, Dravid
snippet: Shanaka on chat with Dhawan: "We get advice from our former players too, but this was a chance to hear from a current player with a lot of experience"

title: Sri Lanka wins T20 series against India
snippet: Leg spinner Wanindu Hasaranga recorded a career-best four wickets for nine runs Thursday as Sri Lanka beat India by seven wickets in the third and final Twenty20 international and clinched the three-match series 2-1.

title: I may even cross over to another party if necessary: Rajitha
snippet: SJB MP- Rajitha Senaratne said he will cross over to another party if he feels necessary.
